title: GOLD Typeface
content:
Corporate font design for the building Gold designed by Luciano Vergara and Dany Berczeller  
The OpenType font includes several alternatives, is a capital with ancient and modern proportions  
 [http://www.e-gold.cl/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415081138/http:/www.e-gold.cl/ "http://www.e-gold.cl/")

greetings,  
Luciano Vergara  
 [www.latinotype.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415081138/http:/www.latinotype.com/ "www.latinotype.com")
author: luciano_vergara
